price: 我没有使他们眼见天地的创造，也没有使他们眼见其自身的创造，我没有把使人迷误者当做助手。
arabic: ۞ مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā ashhadttuhum khalqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walā khalqa anfusihim wamā kuntu muttakhidha al-muḍilīna ʿaḍudan
